contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 1, 1981 D Pontins Youth Brass Band Championships (Section A)
Pontins Youth Contest (Section A) 90 Set Test and Own Choice Pontins pontins-youth-contest
Festival Prelude
Pontins Holiday Camp, Prestatyn, Denbighshire, Wales, UK Bands played Festival Prelude plus own choice - maximum time 8 minutes 30 seconds. 4 bands competed.
Feb. 25, 2012, 7:22 p.m. Nov. 28, 2014, 3:27 p.m.
1 Wakefield Metropolitan Schools Band Les Heppleston
2 South Glamorgan High School Band D. Jones
3 Hampshire County Youth Training Maurice Arnold
4 Metropolitan Borough of Wigan School J. Woodward
